path_root_csv.helpTip: [domain] Path to the dataset csv file.

spv.helpTip: Spokes per volume number. Determines resolution.

max_num_iter.helpTip: Maximum number of iterations in Grasp

max_num_ls.helpTip: Maximum number line searches within each Grasp iteration

nd.helpTip: nd - Notice that json does not recognize tuple format. Define it as a list!

kd.helpTip: kd - This parameter is usually set to 1.5 x nd

is_gpu.helpTip: Only valid if NUFFT operator has a parameter option is_gpu

size_nufft_batch.helpTip: Only valid if NUFFT operator has a parameter option is_gpu. Provide a batch size to avoid GPU memory issues

fov_scaling.helpTip: field of view scaling factor. Downsamples freq domain input by the value and crops image domain input (coil_p) with the factor
